titleStmt.title: The nine English worthies: or, Famous and worthy princes of England being all of one name; beginning with King Henrie the first, and concluding with Prince Henry, eldest sonne to our Soueraigne Lord the King.
titleStmt.author: Fletcher, Robert, purveyor of carriages to Queen Elizabeth.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by H. L[ownes] for Iohn Harrison the yonger: and are to be sold at his shop in Pater-noster rowe, at the signe of the blue Anchor,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Pater-noster rowe, at the signe of the blue Anchor
